title: Same name has my friend on PBE
body:
Im trying to get the same name as my friend 
Does anyone know how can i do it?

replies.body:
Summoner names are unique, so you cannot create one that is identical to another one that is currently in use. You can try using numbers or other uppercase or lowercase letters to make it similar to your friend's, but you cannot make it identical. For complete info, check out our [Summoner Name FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
